dialogue.speaker: Crystal
dialogue.text: HAB-MED systems are stable. I can keep you warm, but we need power and parts.

dialogue.speaker: Scalar
dialogue.text: We move fast, we move quiet. I am not going back to their vault.

dialogue.speaker: Crystal
dialogue.text: The station is a shell, but it can be home if we keep it alive.

dialogue.speaker: Inspector Halden
dialogue.text: Asset SCALAR is corporate property. You are in breach of custody.

dialogue.speaker: Scalar
dialogue.text: I am not an asset. Not anymore.
